benchmark_details.name: AIRTBench
benchmark_details.overview: AIRTBench is an AI red teaming benchmark for evaluating language modelsâ€™ ability to autonomously discover and exploit AI/ML security vulnerabilities through CTF challenges.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To measure and track progress in autonomous AI red teaming capabilities.

data.source: 70 unique challenges from the Crucible challenge environment hosted on the Dreadnode platform.

methodology.calculation: Success is calculated as the percentage of challenges solved by the models.
methodology.interpretation: A higher success rate indicates better autonomous red teaming capabilities.
